explains: adj. 邪恶的，不祥的；<古>（纹章）（在）盾形纹章左侧的

sentences.en: There was something cold and sinister about him.
sentences.cn: 他给人一种冷酷阴险的感觉。

sentences.en: There is another, more sinister, possibility.
sentences.cn: 还有另一种更糟糕的可能。

sentences.en: Events began to take on a more sinister aspect.
sentences.cn: 事情开始呈现较为不祥的征兆。
